abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: TaxonKey: Tortula laureri Lindberg, 1864 or Herbertus stramineus (Dumort.) Trevis. or Fissidens exilis Hedwig, 1801 or Anastrophyllum joergensenii Schiffn. or Anastrophyllum donnianum (Hook.) Steph. Country: Norway HasCoordinate: TRUE The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Kystfuruskoger 2015 1 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY) 1 records from Oskarshamn herbarium (OHN) 1 records from HUCS - Herbário da Universidade de Caxias do Sul 3 records from Herbarium of Umeå University (UME) 4 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Bryophyte Collection 6 records from Gothenburg Herbarium - General (GBIF:IH:GB:Herbarium) 7 records from nnf_verdisetting_vestlandet 9 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 24 records from Lund Botanical Museum (LD) 103 records from Bryophyte Herbarium, Oslo (O-B) 119 records from Norwegian Species Observation Service 120 records from Moss herbarium, UiB 121 records from Jordal 192 records from BioFokus 366 records from Bryophyte herbarium, NTNU University Museum
